name: surface_radioactivity_content_of_254Cf
description: The surface called "surface" means the lower boundary of the atmosphere. "Content" indicates a quantity per unit area. "Radioactivity" means the number of radioactive decays of a material per second. "Cf" means the element "californium" and "254Cf" is the isotope "californium-254" with a half-life of 6.03e+01 days.
